title: Projects Night
excerpt: Join QUT AI & ML Society for Projects Night! Collaborate, showcase ideas, and build AI/ML projects with fellow members.
description: Project Night is where ideas evolve into real-world projects. The evening starts with a lightning talk covering the latest in AI, including: Gemini Diffusion (AI-generated visuals and smart tools), AlphaEvolve (AI-driven digital evolution), and Nano Banana (compact high-performance AI hardware). Afterwards, dive into hands-on building: work on projects at any level, team up, share knowledge, grow your AI/ML skills, and build exciting projects from simple models like Pokémon Identification to advanced AI tools like Action Recognition. Bring your laptop, curiosity, and energy – let’s make something awesome together!
